'''This Is Fine''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Meetings in Outrealm: Series I]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to defeat a [[Pyro Regisvine]] in [[Co-Op Mode]].

==Trivia==
* "This Is Fine" is likely a reference to the meme of the same name, depicting a dog sitting in the middle of a burning room calmly saying, "This is fine." The meme is derived from the webcomic [https://gunshowcomic.com/648 Gunshow].
